goa_tours.title: Goa Beach Paradise
goa_tours.subtitle: Experience the vibrant beaches and Portuguese heritage of India's favorite coastal destination
goa_tours.description: Discover the perfect blend of sun, sand, and cultural heritage in Goa. From pristine beaches and water sports to colonial architecture and vibrant nightlife, our Goa tour packages offer the ultimate coastal getaway for every type of traveler.
inclusions: Daily breakfast and one special seafood dinner
One water sport activity per person

itinerary.title: Arrival & Beach Introduction
itinerary.description: Arrive in Goa, check into your beachside resort, and spend the afternoon relaxing on the beach. Evening welcome dinner with authentic Goan cuisine and cultural performance.

itinerary.title: Beach Hopping & Water Sports
itinerary.description: Full day of beach exploration and water sports. Visit multiple beaches including Baga, Calangute, and Anjuna. Try parasailing, jet skiing, or banana boat rides (one activity included).

itinerary.title: Heritage & Culture
itinerary.description: Morning visit to Old Goa churches and Portuguese heritage sites. Afternoon spice plantation tour with authentic Goan lunch. Evening free for shopping or nightlife.

itinerary.title: Leisure & Departure
itinerary.description: Morning at leisure for last-minute beach time or shopping. Check-out and departure with beautiful memories of your Goan adventure.

highlights: Experience the vibrant nightlife of North Goa
Taste authentic Goan cuisine with Portuguese influences

accommodations.name: Calangute Beach Resort
accommodations.description: Modern beachfront property with direct beach access, swimming pools, seafood restaurant, and evening entertainment.

accommodations.name: South Goa Luxury Resort
accommodations.description: Upscale property on the quieter beaches of South Goa offering premium amenities, spa facilities, and private beach access.

accommodations.name: Baga Beachside Hotel
accommodations.description: Centrally located property near Baga Beach with easy access to nightlife, restaurants, and water sports.

accommodations.name: Portuguese Heritage Villa
accommodations.description: Boutique accommodation in restored Portuguese mansion offering authentic colonial experience with modern amenities.

destinations.name: North Goa Beach Circuit
destinations.description: Experience the vibrant energy of North Goa's famous beaches, water sports, and nightlife. Visit Baga, Calangute, Anjuna, and Vagator beaches along with flea markets and beach shacks.

activities: Arrival and check-in at Calangute beach resort
Evening at Baga Beach with welcome dinner at beach shack
Optional beach party experience
Water sports at Calangute Beach (parasailing, jet skiing, banana boat)
Visit to Anjuna Flea Market (Wednesdays only) or Tibetan Market
Sunset and dinner at Anjuna Beach
Morning cruise on Mandovi River
Visit to Fort Aguada
Free time for shopping and beach activities
Departure

destinations.name: South Goa Serenity
destinations.description: Discover the peaceful and pristine beaches of South Goa with its luxury resorts, clean shores, and relaxed atmosphere. Perfect for couples and those seeking tranquility.

activities: Arrival and check-in at luxury beach resort
Relaxation time at Palolem or Agonda Beach
Sunset yoga session on the beach
Candlelight dinner at beachside restaurant
Morning dolphin spotting cruise
Visit to Cabo de Rama Fort
Beach hopping to Butterfly and Honeymoon beaches
Departure

destinations.name: Goa Heritage Trail
destinations.description: Explore Goa's rich Portuguese colonial heritage with visits to historic churches, mansions, and cultural sites. Experience the unique blend of Indian and European influences.

activities: Arrival and check-in at heritage hotel in Panjim
Old Goa churches tour including Basilica of Bom Jesus and Se Cathedral
Evening walk in Fontainhas Latin Quarter
Visit to Ancestral Goa cultural museum
Tour of Mangueshi and Shanta Durga temples
Spice plantation visit with traditional lunch
Evening river cruise with cultural performance
Morning visit to Reis Magos Fort
Tour of Portuguese mansions in Chandor
Shopping for Goan souvenirs and handicrafts
Departure

destinations.name: Goa Adventure Package
destinations.description: Get your adrenaline pumping with a weekend of thrilling activities in Goa. From water sports to jungle treks, this package combines adventure with beach relaxation.

activities: Arrival and check-in at adventure resort
Introductory scuba diving session in pool
Evening beach bonfire with barbecue dinner
Full day water sports package (parasailing, jet skiing, banana boat, bumper ride)
Sunset kayaking through mangroves
Beach party experience
Morning trek to Dudhsagar Waterfalls
Jeep safari through spice plantations
Evening cruise with fishing experience
Scuba diving trip to Grande Island (for certified divers) or snorkeling
Free time for beach relaxation
Departure
